Overview¶

Functions¶

Description: “Retrieve Balance Graph Info”,
  • Url: “/Users/id”,
  • Method:”GET”,
  • Success Response:

{

  • Code: “200”,

  • Content: {

    • account_balance: [integer]
      • account_savings: [integer]
      • total: [integer]

      }

}
  • Error Response:

{

  • Code: “404”,
  • Content: {error:”Information not found”}

}

Description: “Retrieve Net Worth Graph Info”,

  • Url: “/Users/id”,

  • Method:”GET”,

  • Success Response: { - Code: “200”, - Content: {

    • Net_Worth: [integer]

    • Assets: [integer]

    • Liabilities: [integer]

      }

}
  • Error Response:

{

  • Code: “404”,
  • Content: {error:”Information not found”}

}

Description: “Flex Card Info” - Reuse retrieve budget function, if Flex spending is treated as such

Description: “Retrieve Overview Data Card Info”,
  • Url: “/Users/id”,
  • Method:”GET”,
  • Success Response: {
  • Code: “200”,
  • Content: { - Assets: [integer] - Liabilities: [integer]}
}
  • Error Response:

{

  • Code: “404”,
  • Content: {error:”Information not found”}

}
